expt_aim: How similar a sentence sounds to another sentence.
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
She liked but didn't love the shirt.
The player was skillful or hardworking.
Three of the weekends were sunny.
Some but not all of the movies were funny.
He thought the student was good but not excellent.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
The player was either skillful or hardworking.
Two of the weekends were sunny.
All of the movies were funny.
He thought the student was good.
